word: I saw a throne, and on it sat the Father and the Son. I gazed on Jesus\92 countenance and admired His lovely person. The Father\92s person I could not behold, for a cloud of glorious light covered Him. I asked Jesus if His Father had a form like Himself. He said He had, but I could not behold it, for said He, \93If you should once behold the glory of His person, you would cease to exist.\94 . . .
